column5: How is road from Fort Frances to Dryden? We go to Gull Rock and years ago stopped going that way because of the poor road. Now go west and thru Nestor Falls. Probably shorter thru Dryden. Any comments?

https://www.walleyecentral.com/forums...d.php?t=179990not sure about out of FF, from Dryden it looks good!Here a reply from my post a couple weeks ago! I hope it is still good! A week from today we head North
Years ago we stopped going through Dryden also due to roads, last couple years it's seemed like the road is now fine and saves about 30 minutes! 3.5 hours till we hit the road!!!!!

The 502 has been slowly upgraded over the last number of years. My recollection from a couple trips last year was the first 20 click out of FF was good, the next 20 click was the worst, and everything else was smooth sailing. It seems like they were working their way south over the last couple years. Any recent word on the 2nd 20 clicks north from FF?
502 in now in great shape,upgrades done.
